column1: ⚕️ HEALTH ALERT ⚕️ This year's flu season is off to an alarmingly fast start. But doctors agree: the best way to protect yourself and your family is to get a flu shot -- and soon.  MORE >> https://t.co/OWel1e3KJL https://t.co/tP6reixCns

It was an honor to be trusted with the gavel as the House voted to send the articles of impeachment to the Senate this week.   I urge my colleagues there to fight for a fair and impartial trial next week. The future of our democracy depends on it.

Wishing Senator Lois Court good health and a speedy recovery. You will be missed at the State Capitol but are in our prayers.
As we close out the decade together I look forward to another 10 years of fighting side-by-side for our families our values and our country. Happy New Year friends!
Kwanzaa blessings to you and yours. Wishing you all peace and togetherness today and every day!
Wishing everyone a very merry Christmas this year! May the spirit of generosity stay with us all year long.
Happy Hanukkah friends! As the sun sets and the festivities begin I wish you all a warm and joyful Festival of Lights.
